sentences: Lou Stein (April 22, 1922 – December 11, 2002) was an American jazz pianist.
Born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, Stein joined Ray McKinley's band in 1942.
After the war he worked with Charlie Ventura (1946–47) and became a session musician.
He played with Joe Venuti from 1969 to 1972.
